ygData.subject: RE: Level 43 & Dirge Questions~
ygData.msgSnippet: how much mana does it use for you?  i usually go down to 1.5 bubbs left.  to get back to 3.5 bubbs is more like 30 min if i sit often enough, and i would say
ygData.messageBody:
how much mana does it use for you? i usually go down to 1.5 bubbs left. to
get back to 3.5 bubbs is more like 30 min if i sit often enough, and i would
say 45 min to get back to full. it's not practical, but its a nice bard
mini-harm touch. and no i never use it or have it memmed except very
rarely. i would much rather have a new single target bellow upgrade, like
4x bellow damage with mana usage.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L37 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> There is no practical use. The recycle time is over one hour.
> I use the song whenever I see a full mana bar to kill off things
> quicker or to eliminate a pile of green attackers.
